# 
Tired of old banks that don't understand e-commerce?
# With other Banking Platforms
  * Limits that don't grow with you
  * One big bill at the end of the month
  * Bulky Payments
  * Waste hours in spreadsheets
  * Manually tag all your transactions
  * Earn no rewards on your debit card spend
  * Hidden Fees
  * No Banking Yield


![Marble](https://www.getparker.com/_next/static/media/orb.e2ba74fd.svg)![Marble](https://www.getparker.com/_next/static/media/orb.e2ba74fd.svg)
# Brands that use  **Parker**
  * Surge Limits that grow with you
  * Up to 90 days on every transaction
  * Small daily payments
  * Real time P&L & Cash Flow Dashboard
  * AI categorization of your transactions
  * 2x rewards on all your debit spend‚Åµ
  * Banking services¬π with No Hidden Fees, No minimums
  * High Yield Savings Accounts¬π (up to 3.60%‚Å¥) annual percentage yield (APY)


[Get Started](https://www.getparker.com/</apply>)

# 
With the Parker Card¬≥ we help you grow your profits.
  * Rolling Terms
  * Performance-based Limits


# 
Get more time to payback with Rolling Terms
Old cards force you into paying one big bill at the end of the month. You end up paying your bills "before" you get your profits. With Parker Card,¬≥ you get up to 90 days on every swipe. Now, you can pay your card spend back "after" you get your profits.
# 
Banks just store your cash. Parker shows you how to make more.
  * Contribution Margin
  * Product-level Profitability
  * AI Labeling
  * LTV Analysis


# 
Real-time contribution margin.
Our P&L dashboard gives you a real-time pulse on your margins and bottom line by consolidating your sales and expense data. Say goodbye to spreadsheets.
# 
All the bank features. And more. 2x Rewards.‚Åµ No Minimums.
![Feature - FDIC](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F5NXXHsTGaNtSZeQp6DkY6X%2Fdbf3006f6d2e016da8bc673d8f08c1fc%2FImage__18_.png%3Fw%3D600%26h%3D600%26fit%3Dfill%26q%3D95&w=640&q=75)$3,000,000+ FDIC insurance on accounts and no balance minimums.![Feature - Card creation](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F72lvN1xXdoVLi2RT0fErc7%2F1b6b11d487853b0235bb64b44c02fc0d%2FFeature_-_Card_creation.png%3Fw%3D600%26h%3D600%26fit%3Dfill%26q%3D95&w=640&q=75)Unlimited Parker Card creation + 2x rewards‚Åµ on all card transactions.¬≥![Feature - Wires](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2FlJ2RfJ0ifB01YyM8Ou6HU%2F2513b7f4358506225d530b4f381eda85%2FFeature_-_Wires.png%3Fw%3D600%26h%3D600%26fit%3Dfill%26q%3D95&w=640&q=75)Pay vendors and invoices with ACH, wires, and transfers.![Feature - Interest](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F7My5aMCVl6d7hw506B2mRq%2F161cff2d42cc8e5bf28dedd03e758137%2Finterest_2x.png%3Fw%3D600%26h%3D600%26fit%3Dfill%26q%3D95&w=640&q=75)Earn up to 3.60% Annual Percentage Yield‚Å¥ on qualified interest bearing accounts¬π .
# 
Trusted and used by the  top ecommerce brands in the world.
![Matt Stith](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F19iCe2Du6woEiO2fFQ3Uz8%2Fe30843a0c18c8b9bdcd7a1a56267b1bc%2Fmatt-stith.jpg%3Fw%3D120%26h%3D120%26q%3D95&w=256&q=75)
Matt Stith
Voli Wellness
![Logo: Voli Wellness](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2FZICgOfbuIaD4cfG6AOUTi%2Fba4ac1a09060bf886d2f427810599f30%2FFrame_1533211842.png%3Fw%3D120%26h%3D120%26q%3D95&w=256&q=75)
The fastest way to get a snapshot of our business
‚ÄúParker is the fastest way to get a snapshot of our business covering my cash flow, contribution margin, LTV and product profitability. It makes reporting and decision making much more efficient.‚Äù
![Jordan Nathan](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F37VOlszG1sc5m3GpiARPdB%2F9554a8f7eb3d6f522f3137fb19b9508e%2Fjordan-nathan.jpeg%3Fw%3D120%26h%3D120%26q%3D95&w=256&q=75)
Jordan Nathan
Caraway
![Logo: Caraway](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F3XNnWX89rg5picc6OYkDbr%2F02c82d985fa177a80dd292216d763749%2FFrame_1533211960.png%3Fw%3D120%26h%3D120%26q%3D95&w=256&q=75)
Parker isn‚Äôt just a credit card
‚ÄúParker isn‚Äôt just a credit card. It‚Äôs effectively a financing vehicle. Their team has been awesome at understanding Caraway and creating a credit product that works for us and mirrors the seasonality of our business.‚Äù
![Jon Loomis](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F5WQb1CQfVPAfh1QWdYsdNz%2F28aea2a09b6d3deefd6c29e5773911f9%2FMember-headshots-2_1.png%3Fw%3D120%26h%3D120%26q%3D95&w=256&q=75)
Jon Loomis
Baseballism
![Logo: Baseballism](https://www.getparker.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fimages.ctfassets.net%2Fwlnh5qasiuce%2F1kiF5Q74tKkMg2WU50Edti%2Fecab3f5d2e0d1f582ad0e97812db73ba%2FLogos.png%3Fw%3D120%26h%3D120%26q%3D95&w=256&q=75)
We‚Äôre very bullish on tools like Parker
‚ÄúParker is really just a great product to have in your capital stack. They‚Äôre now my go-to card because of their associated credit terms. We‚Äôre very bullish on tools like Parker because it‚Äôs a simple, easy way to help stabilize our balance sheet.‚Äù

# 
With the Parker Card¬≥ we help you grow your profits.
  * Rolling Terms
  * Performance-based Limits


# 
Get more time to payback with Rolling Terms
Old cards force you into paying one big bill at the end of the month. You end up paying your bills "before" you get your profits. With Parker Card,¬≥ you get up to 90 days on every swipe. Now, you can pay your card spend back "after" you get your profits.
# 
Banks just store your cash. Parker shows you how to make more.
  * Contribution Margin
  * Product-level Profitability
  * AI Labeling
  * LTV Analysis


# 
Real-time contribution margin.
Our P&L dashboard gives you a real-time pulse on your margins and bottom line by consolidating your sales and expense data. Say goodbye to spreadsheets.

All the bank features. And more. 2x Rewards.‚Åµ No Minimums.

generated_description:
**Parker: A Modern Digital Banking Experience for eCommerce Brands**

**Overview:**
Founded in 2019 and based in San Francisco, Parker is a digital banking platform catering specifically to eCommerce brands. As part of the Y Combinator Batch W19, Parker encapsulates the spirit of innovation and fintech agility. With a small but effective team of 10, they are led by Dalton Caldwell, who acts as their Group Partner. 

**Mission:**
Parker's mission is simple yet ambitious: to provide banking services that truly understand the needs of eCommerce businesses. In a landscape dominated by traditional banking institutions, Parker aims to disrupt the status quo by offering tailored solutions that empower brands to grow more effectively and profitably.

**Current Offerings:**
Parker's suite of services includes:
1. **Parker Card**: A credit card designed for flexibility, allowing businesses to make purchases and manage cash flow with up to 90 days to pay back, which is vital for eCommerce sales cycles.
2. **Banking Services**: These come without hidden fees and offer competitive rewards, aimed at meeting the unique demands of online businesses.
3. **Bill Pay**: A streamlined way to manage payables without incurring additional costs.
4. **Analytics**: Real-time insights on cash flow, profit margins, customer acquisition, and more, leveraging AI to categorize transactions automatically.

Parker recently raised $20 million to further strengthen its foothold in eCommerce finance, signaling investor confidence in their vision and execution.

**Target Audience:**
Parker specifically targets eCommerce brands looking for financial partners that understand the complexities of their businesses. Brands that use Parker range from Chomps and Caraway to Spikeball and Oats Overnight, underscoring its appeal among high-growth companies.

**Feature Highlights:**
- **Performance-based Limits**: Unlike traditional banks, Parker offers credit limits that scale with your business growth.
- **Rolling Credit Terms**: Businesses can avoid the old-school pitfalls of bulky monthly bills, instead managing daily payments that fit their cash flow.
- **High Yield Savings Accounts**: Parker provides interest-bearing accounts with rates up to 3.60% APY, a rare find in digital banking.
- **No Minimums**: There are no minimum balance requirements, making it more accessible for startups and smaller eCommerce companies.

**Conclusion:**
Parker is more than just a bank; it's a tool that helps eCommerce brands navigate the complexities of finance with ease and insight. By blending a robust banking platform with tailored financial services, Parker positions itself as an essential partner for modern entrepreneurs looking to thrive in a competitive market. If you‚Äôre tired of traditional banking services that just don‚Äôt get the eCommerce landscape, maybe it‚Äôs time to give Parker a look. 

For more information and to get started, visit [Parker's website](https://www.getparker.com).
